[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img] [url=https://www.patreon.com/oskarpotocki][img]https://i.imgur.com/m7knAau.png[/img][/url]
Vanilla Christmas Expanded is what could easily be described as a temporary, festive mini-mod. Celebrate Christmas on the Rim, add some colour to your colonies and await Christmas presents!
This mod adds several new mechanics to the game, most notably a Christmas tree, being a 1x1 structure, enhancing the beauty of every room and allowing for a new event to occur - Presents! New structure - a fireplace, as well as a whole lot of eggnog are there to allow you to have a truly festive period.
